item.description:
Join us for a fun new activity for our group- indoor rock climbing! If you can climb a ladder, you can do indoor rock climbing. All ages/athletic abilities can participate. I am a beginner!This is a fun & safe environment for everyone. If you haven't tried indoor rock climbing before- now is the time to do it!

We are getting a discounted rate of $15 which includes climbing shoes & harness. A waiver must be signed- you can do that ahead of time at their website (recommended) or it can be filled out online when you arrive. Please do it ahead of time, so we can get started quickly.

For more info on indoor rock climbing and to fill out the waiver ahead of time, visit:

www.rockspotclimbing.com

After rock climbing, we will head to a nearby bar (The Village Manor, 427 Sprague St., Dedham) for drinks, appetizers and socializing.

There is plenty of free parking available.

Looking forward to seeing you for another fun night!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside the venue. If you have trouble finding us, call 774 232 0000
item.name: Indoor Rock Climbing: All Levels Welcome!
